snippet.title: Plokoth - Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Imagine a deep and mysterious jungle full of dangers and wonders. 

Get the game now!! 
samrassy.itch.io/plokoth

Plo goes on a journey to destroy the core of a horrible disease that infected his girlfriend Oth. Plokoth is an atmospheric 2D platforming game set in a mysterious jungle.
